index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing application for financial assistance and execution of a contract with the State of Washington, Department of Social and Health Services for continuation of the Homemaker/Handyman and S.P.I.C.E. Programs; increasing certain objects of expenditure in the 1975 Budget of the Department of Human Resources in connection therewith; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
